Articles.Content: Something happened last week. After the patch, I was getting very good performance. Then, one day when that epilepsy warning came out, it takes forever to get loaded and my performance is down to 17 fps. Tried a reinstall from Steam, but same old.  I am unmodded and have not had serious performance issues up until this point. What happened?

I keep getting that epilepsy warning page every time I start up KSP2 now.   Seeing it once was enough, it doesn't seem necessary to show it at every start up!
Is there a way to turn it off?

Paul

PS. It doesn't seem to affect my game performance, it's just annoying to see it every time!
